--- In junit@y..., Fergus Gallagher <Fergus.Gallagher@o...> wrote:
> For interest I get exactly the same linkage error on 
> org.w3c.dom.Document.  What's so special about that class that it 
should 
> cause the  same error in two different apps.  Can't be coincidence.

> I even tried rebuilding my app from a full set of source files 
(including 
> dom source).
> 
> The problem with the -noloading is that one can't rerun individual 
test 
> cases after a rebuild :-(

If I am missing something or someone else has already answered
to this problem, please apologize.

I do not understand why everyone wants to use loading/noloading.
We have simply followed the FAQ and have added org.w3c.*
(among others) to excluded.properties.

Then you can use the reloading test ui without problems. At least
we were able to do so.

-
Tammo Freese
freese@...
subject: Re: cannot run testing with UI TestRunner?
